EmailTemplate.subject: See you next week at NGA? Stop by booth #1219
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The 2022 NGA Show in Las Vegas is just around the corner, and the NCR Retail team can’t wait! We hope to see you at booth #1219 to learn more about how you can simplify and streamline your enterprise to deliver superior customer experiences, sustain success, and prepare for the future. Come see how NCR helps industry leaders like you run the store end-to-end, enabling them to focus on – and grow – their business.
